Class Questions

java.lang.Object
application.Questions
public class Questions extends Object
Helper providing CRUD and search operations for Question objects.

    • addQuestion

      public void addQuestion(Question question)
      Adds a new Question to the in-memory collection.
      Parameters:
      question - the Question to add

    • getQuestion

      public Question getQuestion(String questionId)
      Retrieves a Question by id.
      Parameters:
      questionId - id to look up
      Returns:
      the Question if found, otherwise null

    • updateQuestion

      public void updateQuestion(Question updatedQuestion)
      Replaces an existing question with an updated instance (matching by id).
      Parameters:
      updatedQuestion - the updated Question

    • deleteQuestion

      public void deleteQuestion(String questionId)
      Deletes a question and any follow-ups recursively.
      Parameters:
      questionId - id of the question to delete

    • searchByTitle

      public Questions searchByTitle(String keyword)
      Returns a Questions collection filtered by title substring (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      keyword - substring to search for
      Returns:
      Questions collection matching the title

    • searchByAuthor

      public Questions searchByAuthor(String author)
      Returns Questions authored by the given user.
      Parameters:
      author - author userName to filter by
      Returns:
      Questions collection authored by the user

    • getAllQuestions

      public List<Question> getAllQuestions()
      Returns a copy of all questions.
      Returns:
      list copy of all questions

    • getUnresolvedQuestions

      public Questions getUnresolvedQuestions()
      Returns only unresolved questions as a Questions collection.
      Returns:
      Questions collection of unresolved questions

    • getFollowUps

      public List<Question> getFollowUps(String parentQuestionId)
      Retrieves follow-up questions for a given parent question id.
      Parameters:
      parentQuestionId - id of the parent question
      Returns:
      list of follow-up Question instances

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true when there are no questions stored.
      Returns:
      true when empty

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of questions in the collection.
      Returns:
      question count
